text: How the Grinch Stole Christmas! is a 1957 book by Dr. Seuss. How the Grinch Stole Christmas may also refer to: * How the Grinch Stole Christmas! (TV special), a 1966 animated special * How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2000 film), a film starring Jim Carrey * Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas! The Musical * Dr. Seuss: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!, a 2007 Nintendo DS video game adaptation ==See also== * The Grinch (2018 film), an animated film adaptation of the book starring Benedict Cumberbatch
title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas (disambiguation)
